languages.text: "Я не была ему слугой, я была его невольницей. Когда наш круг был разорван, он поставил перед мной выбор — подчиниться или погибнуть. Пообещал убить половину меня, если я не буду ковать для него... Ему нужны были знания архимагоса Амарната, а я владела ими. И не видела смысла сопротивляться".

"I was never his servant. I was forced to serve. When our circle was broken, he offered me a choice: submit or die. He threatened to kill half of me if I refused to forge for him. He needed Archmagos Amarnat's knowledge, and I had it. I saw no sense in resisting."
languages.original_text: "Я не была ему слугой, я была его невольницей. Когда наш круг был разорван, он поставил перед мной выбор — подчиниться или погибнуть. Пообещал убить половину меня, если я не буду ковать для него... Ему нужны были знания архимагоса Амарната, а я владела ими. И не видела смысла сопротивляться".

"I was never his servant. I was forced to serve. When our circle was broken, he offered me a choice: submit or die. He threatened to kill half of me if I refused to forge for him. He needed Archmagos Amarnat's knowledge, and I had it. I saw no sense in resisting."

"I was never his servant. I was forced to serve. When our circle was broken, he offered me a choice: submit or die. He threatened to kill half of me if I refused to forge for him. He needed Archmagos Amarnat's knowledge, and I had it. I saw no sense in resisting."

"I was never his servant. I was forced to serve. When our circle was broken, he offered me a choice: submit or die. He threatened to kill half of me if I refused to forge for him. He needed Archmagos Amarnat's knowledge, and I had it. I saw no sense in resisting."

languages.text: “因为我根本就不是他的仆人，我被迫服从他。当他摧毁了我们的圈子时，他给了我一个选择——要么为他服务，要么死亡。他威胁我，说如果我拒绝锻造他想要的东西，他就杀了我的另一半。他需要阿玛纳特大贤者的知识，而我拥有这些知识。我认为反抗他毫无意义。”
languages.original_text: "I was never his servant. I was forced to serve. When our circle was broken, he offered me a choice: submit or die. He threatened to kill half of me if I refused to forge for him. He needed Archmagos Amarnat's knowledge, and I had it. I saw no sense in resisting."

traits.locale_text: “因为我根本就不是他的仆人，我被迫服从他。当他摧毁了我们的圈子时，他给了我一个选择——要么为他服务，要么死亡。他威胁我，说如果我拒绝锻造他想要的东西，他就杀了我的另一半。他需要阿玛纳特大贤者的知识，而我拥有这些知识。我认为反抗他毫无意义。”

languages.text: « Je n'ai jamais été à son service. J'ai été forcée de lui obéir. Lorsque notre cercle s'est brisé, il m'a laissé un choix : me soumettre ou mourir. Il a menacé de tuer mon autre moitié si je refusais de forger pour lui. Il avait besoin du savoir de l'archimagos Amarnat, et moi, je le possédais. Je n'ai pas cru bon de résister. »
languages.original_text: "I was never his servant. I was forced to serve. When our circle was broken, he offered me a choice: submit or die. He threatened to kill half of me if I refused to forge for him. He needed Archmagos Amarnat's knowledge, and I had it. I saw no sense in resisting."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai jamais été à son service. J'ai été forcée de lui obéir. Lorsque notre cercle s'est brisé, il m'a laissé un choix : me soumettre ou mourir. Il a menacé de tuer mon autre moitié si je refusais de forger pour lui. Il avait besoin du savoir de l'archimagos Amarnat, et moi, je le possédais. Je n'ai pas cru bon de résister. »

languages.text: 「最初から私は彼の従者ではなかった。彼に従わざるを得なかったの。私たちの輪が途切れたとき、彼は私に服従か死かという選択を迫った。彼のために鍛造することを拒めば、半身を殺すと脅されたわ。彼は私の持っている大賢人アマルナトの知識を必要としていた。抵抗する意味はないと判断したの」
languages.original_text: "I was never his servant. I was forced to serve. When our circle was broken, he offered me a choice: submit or die. He threatened to kill half of me if I refused to forge for him. He needed Archmagos Amarnat's knowledge, and I had it. I saw no sense in resisting."

traits.locale_text: 「最初から私は彼の従者ではなかった。彼に従わざるを得なかったの。私たちの輪が途切れたとき、彼は私に服従か死かという選択を迫った。彼のために鍛造することを拒めば、半身を殺すと脅されたわ。彼は私の持っている大賢人アマルナトの知識を必要としていた。抵抗する意味はないと判断したの」

languages.text: «Jamás le serví por voluntad propia; me lo impusieron. Cuando se rompió nuestro círculo, me dio a elegir: doblegarme o morir. Me amenazó con matar a mi otra mitad si me negaba a forjar para él. Necesitaba el saber hacer del Archimagos Amarnat. Y lo tenía. Sabía que no tenía sentido resistirme».
languages.original_text: "I was never his servant. I was forced to serve. When our circle was broken, he offered me a choice: submit or die. He threatened to kill half of me if I refused to forge for him. He needed Archmagos Amarnat's knowledge, and I had it. I saw no sense in resisting."

traits.locale_text: «Jamás le serví por voluntad propia; me lo impusieron. Cuando se rompió nuestro círculo, me dio a elegir: doblegarme o morir. Me amenazó con matar a mi otra mitad si me negaba a forjar para él. Necesitaba el saber hacer del Archimagos Amarnat. Y lo tenía. Sabía que no tenía sentido resistirme».

languages.text: "Ich war nie sein Diener. Ich wurde gezwungen, zu dienen. Als unser Zirkel durchbrochen wurde, hat er mir eine Wahl gelassen: mich unterwerfen oder sterben. Er hat gedroht, mich zur Hälfte zu töten, wenn ich mich weigere, für ihn zu schmieden. Er brauchte das Wissen von Erzmagos Amarnat, ich besaß es. Ich sah keinen Sinn darin, mich zu wehren."
languages.original_text: "I was never his servant. I was forced to serve. When our circle was broken, he offered me a choice: submit or die. He threatened to kill half of me if I refused to forge for him. He needed Archmagos Amarnat's knowledge, and I had it. I saw no sense in resisting."

Er hat gedroht, mich zur Hälfte zu töten, wenn ich mich weigere, für ihn zu schmieden. Er brauchte das Wissen von Erzmagos Amarnat, ich besaß es. Ich sah keinen Sinn darin, mich zu wehren."
